data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.

variations.description:
Produces ranged infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
influences: Buildings generate +100% tax while within the influence of the Imperial Academy.
The research rate of buildings within influence of a Mosque or a Madrasa is increased for each garrisoned Scholar in all Mosques and Madrasas.
Unit production costs reduced by -20% when within the influence of a Keep.
Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.

Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.
Military unit production rate increased +20%/+30%/+40% by Age while within the influence of a Blacksmith or University. The Istanbul Observatory increases the bonus to +60%.

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

data.name: Farm

Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

variations.description: Increases your maximum Population by 5. Malian Houses cost half as many resources as standard.

data.name: House of Wisdom
data.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Ayyubid Dynasty.
Ayyubids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.
Wing bonuses improve based on the Age they were built.
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.

house-of-wisdom-2.name: House of Wisdom
house-of-wisdom-2.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Abbasid Dynasty.
Abbasids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +2.

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.

variations.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a mangonel. Must be built on a Stone Wall. 
Can be used to access the top of walls.

Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' fire rate.

Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
Place a Relic here to generate Gold and improve armor, damage, weapon range and sight range.

data.name: Aqueduct
data.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.

variations.name: Aqueduct
variations.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.

data.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

data.name: Cistern
data.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +10/14/18/22/26% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura. Cistern costs increase the more Cisterns are built.

variations.name: Cistern
variations.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +10/14/18/22/26% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura. Cistern costs increase the more Cisterns are built.

data.name: Cistern of the First Hill
data.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.
Flasks refill every 30 seconds to a maximum of 20 active flasks.

variations.name: Cistern of the First Hill
variations.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.
Flasks refill every 30 seconds to a maximum of 20 active flasks.

data.name: Foreign Engineering Company
data.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Hui Hui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.

variations.name: Foreign Engineering Company
variations.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Hui Hui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Golden Horn Tower
data.description: Periodically produces unlocked Mercenary Units for free.

variations.name: Golden Horn Tower
variations.description: Periodically produces unlocked Mercenary Units for free.

data.name: Grand Winery
data.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.

variations.name: Grand Winery
variations.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Imperial Hippodrome
data.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 30 seconds. Earn more points by killing enemy units.

variations.name: Imperial Hippodrome
variations.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 30 seconds. Earn more points by killing enemy units.
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Mercenary House
data.description:
Produces Mercenary units for Olive Oil after purchasing a Mercenary Contract. One contract can be purchased.
Unlock another set of Mercenaries with +50% production speed by placing this building near a Trade Post.

data.name: Olive Grove

Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Olive Grove.
Only one Villager can work each Olive Grove.
Byzantine Villagers gather Olive Oil equal to 20% of Food gathered.

data.name: Granary
data.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Improves the Farm gather rate of nearby Villagers by +10% (stacks with other Granaries). Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.

data.name: Imperial Academy

variations.description: Nearby buildings generate 100% more Gold from taxes. Imperial Officials produced here cost 30% less resources and can drop off taxes at this building.

data.name: Imperial Palace

A spy Landmark with 28 tile sight radius and the Imperial Spies ability. Activate to view location of enemy workers for 10 seconds.

data.name: Spirit Way
data.description:
Dynasty technology can be researched here for -50% cost and +150% research speed. When a dynasty unit is killed, nearby units receive +20% attack speed and +20 health over 10 seconds.
Imperial Officials can drop off taxes at this building.

data.name: College of Artillery

Produces the Royal Artillery versions of the Cannon, Ribauldequin, and Culverin, which do +30% more damage.
Unlocks the Artillery ability for Cannons.
Contains Siege and Gunpowder Technologies, trains units and researches technologies 50% faster.

data.description: Generates and stores resources over time, the more resources stored the faster they are generated. Select between Food, Wood, Stone, or Gold. Generates stone at half the rate.

data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

data.name: Saharan Trade Network
data.description:
Acts as a Toll Outpost that comes with Defensive Arrowslits technology researched.
All Traders and Trade Ships taxed will generate Food equal to the taxed Gold at this Landmark. All other Toll Outposts will generate 50% of taxed Gold as Food.

data.name: Toll Outpost
data.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Passing Traders and Trade Ships instantly provide an additional 8% of their carried Gold. Does not generate any bonus tax if a toll outpost is built within range of another one.

data.description: Acts as a Keep. All Keeps gain an aura that increases Trader and Trade Ship movement speed by +30% and armor by +8.

variations.description: Acts as a Keep. All Keeps gain an aura that increases Trader and Trade Ship movement speed by +30% and armor by +8.

data.name: Sultanhani Trade Network
data.description: Acts as a Market. Comes with 3 Traders garrisoned and generates +24 Gold per minute for each one. Up to 10 Traders can be garrisoned.

variations.name: Sultanhani Trade Network
variations.description: Acts as a Market. Comes with 3 Traders garrisoned and generates +24 Gold per minute for each one. Up to 10 Traders can be garrisoned.

data.name: Twin Minaret Medrese
data.description: Acts as a Mill. Grows 4 Berry Bushes which can be harvested +50% faster. Berry Bushes are regrown after 120 seconds if depleted.

variations.name: Twin Minaret Medrese
variations.description: Acts as a Mill. Grows 4 Berry Bushes which can be harvested +50% faster. Berry Bushes are regrown after 120 seconds if depleted.

data.name: Abbey of the Trinity
data.description: Acts as a Monastery. Can produce Warrior Monks at half the cost and contains unique religious technologies.

variations.name: Abbey of the Trinity
variations.description: Acts as a Monastery. Can produce Warrior Monks at half the cost and contains unique religious technologies.

data.name: Cathedral of the Tsar
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Cathedral of the Tsar
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

data.name: Fortified Palisade Gate
data.description: Relatively sturdy defensive gate. Must be built on a Fortified Palisade Wall segment.

variations.name: Fortified Palisade Gate
variations.description: Relatively sturdy defensive gate. Must be built on a Fortified Palisade Wall segment.

data.name: Fortified Palisade Wall
data.description:
Well-built defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

variations.name: Fortified Palisade Wall
variations.description:
Well-built defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

data.name: High Armory
data.description: Decrease the cost of siege engines in nearby Siege Workshops by -20%. Contains unique siege engine technologies.

variations.name: High Armory
variations.description: Decrease the cost of siege engines in nearby Siege Workshops by -20%. Contains unique siege engine technologies.

data.name: High Trade House
data.description:
Generates Gold like a Hunting Cabin with the value increased by +400%, without claiming any trees. Spawns a Huntable Deer every 60 seconds.
Villagers can drop off Food at this building.

variations.name: High Trade House
variations.description:
Generates Gold like a Hunting Cabin with the value increased by +400%, without claiming any trees. Spawns a Huntable Deer every 60 seconds.
Villagers can drop off Food at this building.

data.name: Hunting Cabin
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. It houses technologies to improve Food gathering and produces Scouts.
Generates Gold based on the number of nearby trees. Trees in overlapped areas are only counted once.

variations.name: Hunting Cabin
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. It houses technologies to improve Food gathering and produces Scouts.
Generates Gold based on the number of nearby trees. Trees in overlapped areas are only counted once.

data.name: Kremlin
data.description:
Acts as a Wooden Fortress that comes with Arrowslits, Castle Turret, and Castle Watch technologies.
Can Levy Militia every 80 seconds to the Capital Town Center.

variations.name: Kremlin
variations.description:
Acts as a Wooden Fortress that comes with Arrowslits, Castle Turret, and Castle Watch technologies.
Can Levy Militia every 80 seconds to the Capital Town Center.
influences: Lumber Camps and Town Centers within the influence of a Wooden Fortress return 20% more Wood.

data.name: Spasskaya Tower
data.description:
Acts as a Keep with all weapon emplacements and increased health.
Unlocks the building of Stone Walls, Stone Gates, and Stone Wall Towers.

variations.name: Spasskaya Tower
variations.description:
Acts as a Keep with all weapon emplacements and increased health.
Unlocks the building of Stone Walls, Stone Gates, and Stone Wall Towers.

data.name: The Golden Gate
data.description: Allows the exchange of resources at a favorable rate. Generates an additional exchange every minute.

variations.name: The Golden Gate
variations.description: Allows the exchange of resources at a favorable rate. Generates an additional exchange every minute.

data.name: Wooden Fortress
data.description: Sturdy wooden stronghold with extensive line of sight that detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Attacks while garrisoned.

variations.name: Wooden Fortress
variations.description: Sturdy wooden stronghold with extensive line of sight that detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Attacks while garrisoned.
influences: Lumber Camps and Town Centers within the influence of a Wooden Fortress return 20% more Wood.

data.name: Jiangnan Tower
data.description:
Acts as a tax drop-off for Imperial Officials.
Receive a free unit at the tower whenever a Barracks, Archery Range, or Stable is completed. Receive a free Villager whenever a Town Center is completed.

variations.name: Jiangnan Tower
variations.description:
Acts as a tax drop-off for Imperial Officials.
Receive a free unit at the tower whenever a Barracks, Archery Range, or Stable is completed. Receive a free Villager whenever a Town Center is completed.

data.name: Meditation Gardens
data.description:
Generates resources depending on the type of resources nearby. 
The more resources are nearby, the more resources are generated. Enemy units nearby disturb the peace and reduce resources generated.

variations.name: Meditation Gardens
variations.description:
Generates resources depending on the type of resources nearby. 
The more resources are nearby, the more resources are generated. Enemy units nearby disturb the peace and reduce resources generated.

data.name: Mount Lu Academy
data.description:
Imperial Officials collect tax twice as often and also collect 20% of taxes as Food.
Contains unique upgrades that greatly improve the Imperial Official unit.

variations.name: Mount Lu Academy
variations.description:
Imperial Officials collect tax twice as often and also collect 20% of taxes as Food.
Contains unique upgrades that greatly improve the Imperial Official unit.

data.name: Shaolin Monastery
data.description: Unique Monastery capable of producing Shaolin Monks. From the Yuan Dynasty onwards, Shaolin Monks can also be produced from Pagodas.

variations.name: Shaolin Monastery
variations.description: Unique Monastery capable of producing Shaolin Monks. From the Yuan Dynasty onwards, Shaolin Monks can also be produced from Pagodas.

data.name: Temple of the Sun
data.description: Activate powerful abilities that improve speed, damage, range, or regeneration of specific units.

variations.name: Temple of the Sun
variations.description: Activate powerful abilities that improve speed, damage, range, or regeneration of specific units.

data.name: Zhu Xi's Library
data.description:
Hosts a range of highly unique upgrades.
Can unlock Yuan Raiders and Imperial Guards. Only 2 technologies can be researched.

variations.name: Zhu Xi's Library
variations.description:
Hosts a range of highly unique upgrades.
Can unlock Yuan Raiders and Imperial Guards. Only 2 technologies can be researched.
